creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a baby in a reclining bouncy seat on a table beneath two windows with eyelet-trimmed curtains in a corner
markings: on back stamped in red: JOANNE / LEON / 131 / POMONA RO / ANN ARBOR / MICHIGAN / 48103 | on back on sticker: Joanne Leonard / 1319 Pomona Rd. / Ann Arbor, Mich. 48103
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard
title: Julia’s morning, with window in Inverness, CA
